isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - OPERATION - ENGINE BRAKE

svcproc.title: ENGINE BRAKE
svcproc.para: With electronic engines, the ABS controller is connected to the engine ECM through the J1922 Data Link. The EC-15 sends a signal indicating a possible wheel lockup, and the engine ECM disables the engine brake.
With the Caterpillar 3406C mechanical engine, the ABS controller uses Engine Brake Relay (166) to turn OFF the power to the engine brake system.
